headline: Lennar’s New San Marcos Launch: Can Lifestyle Communities Bolster Its Affordable Housing Strategy (LEN)?
summary: In October 2025, Lennar announced it began selling homes at River Bridge Ranch, a new single-family community in San Marcos, Texas, featuring 28 home designs and a range of amenities with prices starting in the mid US$200,000s. This launch highlights Lennar’s commitment to addressing demand for lifestyle-oriented and moderately priced homes even as housing affordability is challenged by elevated mortgage rates. We’ll examine how Lennar’s latest community launch influences its investment...
